shipper_section.pickup_instructions: Pepsi requires loaded trailers to be fully sealed before leaving or delivering to any facility, unsealed trailers may result in a full claim.

receiver_section.receiver_instructions: OS&D/Refused product must be reported w/photos immediately. Pepsi requires loaded trailers to be fully sealed before leaving or delivering to any facility, unsealed trailers may result in a full claim.
